`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",meta:"{11}",children:`// main.tsx or main.jsx
import React from "react";
import ReactDOM from "react-dom/client";
import {NextUIProvider} from "@nextui-org/react";
import App from "./App";
import "./index.css";

ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById("root")).render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <NextUIProvider>
      <main className="dark text-foreground bg-background">
        <App />
      </main>
    </NextUIProvider>
  </React.StrictMode>,
);
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:66,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:66,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",children:`module.exports = {
  plugins: [
    nextui({
      prefix: "nextui", // prefix for themes variables
      addCommonColors: false, // override common colors (e.g. "blue", "green", "pink").
      defaultTheme: "light", // default theme from the themes object
      defaultExtendTheme: "light", // default theme to extend on custom themes
      layout: {}, // common layout tokens (applied to all themes)
      themes: {
        light: {
          layout: {}, // light theme layout tokens
          colors: {}, // light theme colors
        },
        dark: {
          layout: {}, // dark theme layout tokens
          colors: {}, // dark theme colors
        },
        // ... custom themes
      },
    }),
  ],
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:91,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:91,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`type BaseThemeUnit = {
  small?: string;
  medium?: string;
  large?: string;
};

type FontThemeUnit = {
  small?: string;
  medium?: string;
  large?: string;
  tiny?: string;
};

interface LayoutTheme {
  /**
   * The default font size applied across the components.
   */
  fontSize?: FontThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The default line height applied across the components.
   */
  lineHeight?: FontThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The default radius applied across the components.
   * we recommend to use \`rem\` units.
   */
  radius?: BaseThemeUnit;
  /**
   * A number between 0 and 1 that is applied as opacity-[value] when
   * the component is disabled.
   */
  disabledOpacity?: string | number;
  /**
   * The default height applied to the divider component.
   * we recommend to use \`px\` units.
   */
  dividerWeight?: string;
  /**
   * The border width applied across the components.
   */
  borderWidth?: BaseThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The box shadow applied across the components.
   */
  boxShadow?: BaseThemeUnit;
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:203,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/russuiulia/new-iasig/docs/content/docs/customization/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d5e96aae-56bc-4ac4-a33c-53d32fe45634.mdx",lineNumber:203,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`type ColorScale = {
  50: string;
  100: string;
  200: string;
  300: string;
  400: string;
  500: string;
  600: string;
  700: string;
  800: string;
  900: string;
  foreground: string; // contrast color
  DEFAULT: string;
};

type BaseColors = {
  background: ColorScale; // the page background color
  foreground: ColorScale; // the page text color
  divider: ColorScale; // used for divider and single line border
  overlay: ColorScale; // used for modal, popover, etc.
  focus: ColorScale; // used for focus state outline
  content1: ColorScale; // used for card, modal, popover, etc.
  content2: ColorScale;
  content3: ColorScale;
  content4: ColorScale;
};

// brand colors
type ThemeColors = BaseColors & {
  default: ColorScale;
  primary: ColorScale;
  secondary: ColorScale;
  success: ColorScale;
  warning: ColorScale;
  danger: ColorScale;
};
